content: roller skate leash crochet pattern by crafting callie skill level easy hook size size f 3 75mm sizing 45-50 x 1 abbreviations yarn chain = chain stitch sugar n cream lily cotton 3 st= stitch oz/85 g worsted weight single_crochet= single_crochet for this project i used the crown jewels ombre skein additional materials *it s important to use a non- stretch yarn for this project yarn needle disclaimer this pattern is intended for personal use only duplication of this pattern for sale or distribution is protected under copyright and are property of crafting callie stitch guide single_crochet stitch single_crochet insert hook into stitch pull through 1 loop leaving 2 loops on the hook yarn over pull through both loops pattern notes this is a great beginner project teaching you to hold gauge count stitches and practice customization you can choose to make this leash shorter or longer just by decreasing the initial chain in the beginning instructions begin chain 221 row 1 starting in the second stitch from the hook single_crochet in every stitch across at the end of the row turn the project over chain 1 row 2 single_crochet in every stitch across turn chain 1 row 3 single_crochet in every stitch across chain 1 tie off you will now have a long leash with no loops at the end take one end of your leash fold it over to create a loop that s about 3 inches long using your yarn and a yarn needle stitch that loop to your leash knot and tie off do the same on the other side ensuring to stitch on the same side of the leash loop the leash through your new loops so you have 2 adjustable larger loops to hook onto your skates
